about_the_game:
This Red Impact demo will help us improve the game from your feedback!
We are looking to see how it runs on different hardware, and your response is greatly appreciated.
Currently included are:
  • Two Enemies.
  • Partial Buildings / Upgrades.
  • Campaign for the First Planet.
  • Prestige (Endless) mode for the First Planet.
detailed_description:
This Red Impact demo will help us improve the game from your feedback!
We are looking to see how it runs on different hardware, and your response is greatly appreciated.
Currently included are:
  • Two Enemies.
  • Partial Buildings / Upgrades.
  • Campaign for the First Planet.
  • Prestige (Endless) mode for the First Planet.
name: Red Impact Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Defend entire planets against hostile invaders in this full 3D tower defense game. Manage resources and space while constructing weapons, defenses, and structures to withstand the destructive onslaught across multiple planets.
